value.title: Basic Sharing, and Manage Permissions in Power BI Simple, but Useful
value.excerpt: Power BI provides multiple ways of sharing content with users. Each sharing method has pros and cons and can be used for specific scenarios. Some of the sharing methods can be used together to build a framework for sharing. In this post, I will talk about the most basic way of sharing Power BI content.

value.title: Set Different Levels of Access on the Same Dataset in Power BI using Row Level Security
value.excerpt: Learn how to set different levels of access to the users of the same report and same dataset in Power BI using Row Level Security. The dataset link is available in my blog post here:  https://radacad.com/row-level-security-configuration-in-power-bi-desktop

value.title: Blank row in DAX
value.excerpt: VALUES and DISTINCT are two functions that differ in how they could add a blank row to the result (or not). value.title: CALCULATE in DAX #06: Using ALLSELECTED
value.excerpt: Learn how to correctly use ALLSELECTED in CALCULATE to compare a number with visual totals. value.title: Connect and analyze your Dynamics 365 data​
value.excerpt: Connect and analyze your Dynamics 365 Data​

value.title: Implement row-level security
value.excerpt: Row-level security (RLS) allows you to create a single or a set of reports that targets data for a specific user. In this module, you will learn how to implement RLS by using either a static or dynamic method and how Microsoft Power BI simplifies testing RLS in Power BI Desktop and Power BI service.

value.title: Sales Prediction Model with Python and Power BI
value.excerpt: Create a Linear Regression Model with Python and Power BI. Use What IF parameters in Power BI to give the user dynamic investment inputs.   Contact me on LinkedIn  https://www.linkedin.com/in/gaelimholland

value.title: Avoid refresh errors with missing columns in Power BI/Power Query
value.excerpt: Have you refreshed Power BI files and got errors due to missing columns or unwanted columns? Here I show you how to avoid new columns for getting added and refresh error from missing columns. value.title: Convert data from HTML to Plain Text using Power Query for Power BI Table Visualization
value.excerpt: As we all know, Power BI table visualization does not support HTML generation. So, we need to convert our HTML text to Plain text.   With the help of Power Query function, we can easily remove HTML tags from the Text in Power Query. To implement that we need to use function HTML.table() in Power Query.
